data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of the easterly airstream, it will be humid in the morning and at night and warm during the day over the coast of southern China today and tomorrow. A trough of low pressure is expected to affect southern China in the latter part of this week to early next week. There will be occasional showers and isolated thunderstorms over the region. The northeast monsoon will bring a few rain patches to southern China midweek next week and temperatures will fall slightly.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260225","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"Light winds at first, becoming east force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches and coastal mist in the morning and at night.
